metadata.synopsis: Death AD for Sarevok at the Murder Tribunal. Sarevok is presiding over the Murder Tribunal to judge Bhaalists who aspire to become Unholy Assassins. He will react differently, depending on how far the player has advanced in to the Murder Tribunal.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Go to the Murder Tribunal: "oe MT_Court"- This AD will play when Sarevok dies: S_LOW_MurderTribunal_Sarevok_ae9f784a-ea64-4297-95a7-8377e85231b6

0.speaker: Sarevok Anchev
0.text: Father... forgive me. I have failed you.

2.speaker: Sarevok Anchev
2.text: I... am not the last... I am but one more offering in Bhaal's name.
